text: 5|36|niccayamaka nirakarippavarkalukku ippumiyil ulla anaittum, attutan ataipponra oru pakamum (contamaka) iruntu, avarkal ivai anaittaiyum tankal marumai nalin vetanaiyiliruntu tappikka piratiyakak kotuttalum avarkalitamiruntu (atu) ankikarikkappata mattatu. Melum, avarkalukkut tunpuruttum vetanaiye kitaikkum
